name: ZU - DEMO
description:
H-Hey... hello... I don't know if you can hear me, but...

If by any chance you can hear me. I want you to know that I love you with all my being.

Please... don't leave... don't leave...

Be strong, Zu.

See you soon.

Embark on the adventure of Zu, a girl with an unknown past who, without warning, finds herself in a new world full of fantastic creatures. Will she be able to return to her home world?

WARNING: This game contains images and themes that may be disturbing to some people.
